p:
Where B
j is the biomass of phytoplankton functional type j, t 0 is the mean from 1998 to 2018. The time period for t
i is chosen based on the question to be addressed. For Fig. 4b, t
i is a 15-year mean 2085–2100. To calculate trends, ToE, and provide output for Fig. 10e, we used annual average biomass for each year to construct yearly indices from 1995 to 2100. If there is no change in the community structure, the index will be 0. If there is a completely new community structure (i.e. no biomass of any of the original types), the index is 1. This index is calculated for each grid cell in the model.
